verses.text: In the \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* of \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w had|strong="H2370"\w* a \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* and \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* of his \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* his \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*: \w then|strong="H0116"\w* he \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w* the \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \add and\add* \w told|strong="H0560"\w* the \w sum|strong="H7217"\w* of the \w matters|strong="H4406"\w*.\f + \fr 7.1 \ft had: Chaldee, saw\f*\f + \fr 7.1 \ft matters: or, words\f*

\w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* and \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, I \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* in my \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w by|strong="H5974"\w* \w night|strong="H3916"\w*, and, \w behold|strong="H0718"\w*, the \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w winds|strong="H7308"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w strove|strong="H1519"\w* upon the \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w sea|strong="H3221"\w*.

And \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* came \w up|strong="H5559"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3221"\w*, \w diverse|strong="H8133"\w* \w one|strong="H1668"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w another|strong="H1668"\w*.

The \w first|strong="H6933"\w* \add was\add* like a \w lion|strong="H0744"\w*, and had \w eagle’s|strong="H5403"\w* \w wings|strong="H1611"\w*: I \w beheld|strong="H1934"\w* \w till|strong="H5705"\w* the \w wings|strong="H1611"\w* thereof were \w plucked|strong="H4804"\w*, and it was lifted \w up|strong="H5191"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, and made \w stand|strong="H6966"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* the \w feet|strong="H7271"\w* as a \w man|strong="H0606"\w*, and a \w man’s|strong="H0606"\w* \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* was \w given|strong="H3052"\w* to it.\f + \fr 7.4 \ft and it: or, wherewith it\f*

And \w behold|strong="H0718"\w* \w another|strong="H0317"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w*, a \w second|strong="H8578"\w*, \w like|strong="H1821"\w* to a \w bear|strong="H1678"\w*, and it raised \w up|strong="H6966"\w* itself on \w one|strong="H2298"\w* \w side|strong="H7859"\w*, and \add it had\add* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w ribs|strong="H5967"\w* in the \w mouth|strong="H6433"\w* of it \w between|strong="H0997"\w* the \w teeth|strong="H8128"\w* of it: and they \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* unto it, \w Arise|strong="H6966"\w*, \w devour|strong="H0399"\w* \w much|strong="H7690"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1321"\w*.\f + \fr 7.5 \ft it raised…: or, it raised up one dominion\f*

\w After|strong="H0870"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* I \w beheld|strong="H1934"\w*, and \w lo|strong="H0718"\w* \w another|strong="H0317"\w*, like a \w leopard|strong="H5245"\w*, which had \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* the \w back|strong="H1355"\w* of it \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w wings|strong="H1611"\w* of a \w fowl|strong="H5776"\w*; the \w beast|strong="H2423"\w* had also \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w heads|strong="H7217"\w*; and \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* was \w given|strong="H3052"\w* to it.

\w After|strong="H0870"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* I \w saw|strong="H1934"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3916"\w* \w visions|strong="H2376"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H0718"\w* a \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w*, \w dreadful|strong="H1763"\w* and \w terrible|strong="H0574"\w*, and \w strong|strong="H8624"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3493"\w*; and it had \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8128"\w*: it \w devoured|strong="H0399"\w* and brake in \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w*, and \w stamped|strong="H7512"\w* the \w residue|strong="H7606"\w* with the \w feet|strong="H7271"\w* of it: and \w it|strong="H1932"\w* \add was\add* \w diverse|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* that \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* it; and it had \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w*.

I \w considered|strong="H1934"\w* the \w horns|strong="H7162"\w*, and, \w behold|strong="H0431"\w*, there came \w up|strong="H5559"\w* \w among|strong="H0997"\w* them \w another|strong="H0317"\w* \w little|strong="H2192"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, \w before|strong="H6925"\w* whom there were \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w first|strong="H6933"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w* plucked up by the \w roots|strong="H6132"\w*: and, \w behold|strong="H0431"\w*, in \w this|strong="H1668"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \add were\add* \w eyes|strong="H5870"\w* like the \w eyes|strong="H5870"\w* of \w man|strong="H0606"\w*, and a \w mouth|strong="H6433"\w* \w speaking|strong="H4449"\w* great \w things|strong="H7260"\w*.

¶ I \w beheld|strong="H1934"\w* \w till|strong="H5705"\w* the \w thrones|strong="H3764"\w* were cast \w down|strong="H7412"\w*, and the \w Ancient|strong="H6268"\w* of \w days|strong="H3118"\w* did \w sit|strong="H3488"\w*, whose \w garment|strong="H3831"\w* \add was\add* \w white|strong="H2358"\w* as \w snow|strong="H8517"\w*, and the \w hair|strong="H8177"\w* of his \w head|strong="H7217"\w* like the \w pure|strong="H5343"\w* \w wool|strong="H6015"\w*: his \w throne|strong="H3764"\w* \add was like\add* the \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w flame|strong="H7631"\w*, \add and\add* his \w wheels|strong="H1535"\w* \add as\add* \w burning|strong="H1815"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*.

A \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w stream|strong="H5103"\w* \w issued|strong="H5047"\w* and came \w forth|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* him: \w thousand|strong="H0506"\w* \w thousands|strong="H0506"\w* \w ministered|strong="H8120"\w* unto him, and ten \w thousand|strong="H7240"\w* times ten \w thousand|strong="H7240"\w* \w stood|strong="H6966"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* him: the \w judgment|strong="H1780"\w* was \w set|strong="H3488"\w*, and the \w books|strong="H5609"\w* were \w opened|strong="H6606"\w*.

I \w beheld|strong="H1934"\w* \w then|strong="H0116"\w* \w because|strong="H4481"\w* of the \w voice|strong="H7032"\w* of the \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w words|strong="H4406"\w* which the \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w spake|strong="H4449"\w*: I \w beheld|strong="H1934"\w* \add even\add* \w till|strong="H5705"\w* the \w beast|strong="H2423"\w* was \w slain|strong="H6992"\w*, and his \w body|strong="H1655"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0007"\w*, and \w given|strong="H3052"\w* to the \w burning|strong="H3346"\w* \w flame|strong="H0785"\w*.

As concerning the \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* of the \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w*, they had their \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* taken \w away|strong="H5709"\w*: yet their \w lives|strong="H2417"\w* were \w prolonged|strong="H3052"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* a \w season|strong="H2166"\w* and \w time|strong="H5732"\w*.\f + \fr 7.12 \ft their lives…: Chaldee, a prolonging in life was given them\f*

I \w saw|strong="H1934"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3916"\w* \w visions|strong="H2376"\w*, and, \w behold|strong="H0718"\w*, \add one\add* like the \w Son|strong="H1247"\w* of \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* the \w clouds|strong="H6050"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and \w came|strong="H4291"\w* \w to|strong="H5705"\w* the \w Ancient|strong="H6268"\w* of \w days|strong="H3118"\w*, and they brought him \w near|strong="H7127"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* him.

And there was \w given|strong="H3052"\w* him \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w*, and \w glory|strong="H3367"\w*, and a \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, that \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, \w nations|strong="H0524"\w*, and \w languages|strong="H3961"\w*, should \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* him: his \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w* \add is\add* an \w everlasting|strong="H5957"\w* \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w*, which shall \w not|strong="H3809"\w* pass \w away|strong="H5709"\w*, and his \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \add that\add* which shall \w not|strong="H3809"\w* be \w destroyed|strong="H2255"\w*.

¶ \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* was \w grieved|strong="H3735"\w* in my \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* of \add my\add* \w body|strong="H5085"\w*, and the \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* of my \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* me.\f + \fr 7.15 \ft body: Chaldee, sheath\f*

I came \w near|strong="H7127"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w one|strong="H2298"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* them that stood \w by|strong="H6966"\w*, and \w asked|strong="H1156"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w* the \w truth|strong="H3330"\w* of \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w*. So he \w told|strong="H0560"\w* me, and made me \w know|strong="H3046"\w* the \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* of the \w things|strong="H4406"\w*.

\w These|strong="H0459"\w* \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w*, \w which|strong="H0581"\w* are \w four|strong="H0703"\w*, \add are\add* \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*, \add which\add* shall \w arise|strong="H6966"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*.

But the \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5946"\w* shall \w take|strong="H6902"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, and \w possess|strong="H2631"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*, even \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*.\f + \fr 7.18 \ft most…: Chaldee, high ones, that is, things, or, places\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* I \w would|strong="H6634"\w* know the \w truth|strong="H3321"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w*, which \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w diverse|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* the others, \w exceeding|strong="H3493"\w* \w dreadful|strong="H1763"\w*, whose \w teeth|strong="H8128"\w* \add were of\add* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, and his \w nails|strong="H2953"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*; \add which\add* \w devoured|strong="H0399"\w*, brake in \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w*, and \w stamped|strong="H7512"\w* the \w residue|strong="H7606"\w* with his \w feet|strong="H7271"\w*;\f + \fr 7.19 \ft from…: Chaldee, from all those\f*

And \w of|strong="H5922"\w* the \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w* that \add were\add* in his \w head|strong="H7217"\w*, and \add of\add* the \w other|strong="H0317"\w* which came \w up|strong="H5559"\w*, and \w before|strong="H4481"\w* whom \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w fell|strong="H5308"\w*; even \add of\add* that \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w that|strong="H1797"\w* had \w eyes|strong="H5870"\w*, and a \w mouth|strong="H6433"\w* that \w spake|strong="H4449"\w* very great \w things|strong="H7260"\w*, whose \w look|strong="H2376"\w* \add was\add* \w more|strong="H4481"\w* \w stout|strong="H7229"\w* \w than|strong="H4481"\w* his \w fellows|strong="H2273"\w*.

I \w beheld|strong="H1934"\w*, and the \w same|strong="H1797"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w war|strong="H7129"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* the \w saints|strong="H6922"\w*, and \w prevailed|strong="H3202"\w* against them;

\w Until|strong="H5705"\w* the \w Ancient|strong="H6268"\w* of \w days|strong="H3118"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w*, and \w judgment|strong="H1780"\w* was \w given|strong="H3052"\w* to the \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5946"\w*; and the \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w came|strong="H4291"\w* that the \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* \w possessed|strong="H2631"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3652"\w* he \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, The \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, which shall be \w diverse|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4437"\w*, and shall \w devour|strong="H0399"\w* the \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, and shall tread it \w down|strong="H1759"\w*, and break it in \w pieces|strong="H1855"\w*.

And the \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* this \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \add are\add* \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \add that\add* shall \w arise|strong="H6966"\w*: and \w another|strong="H0321"\w* shall \w rise|strong="H6966"\w* \w after|strong="H0311"\w* them; and he shall be \w diverse|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* the \w first|strong="H6933"\w*, and he shall \w subdue|strong="H8214"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*.

And he shall \w speak|strong="H4449"\w* \add great\add* \w words|strong="H4406"\w* \w against|strong="H6655"\w* the most \w High|strong="H5943"\w*, and shall wear \w out|strong="H1080"\w* the \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5946"\w*, and \w think|strong="H5452"\w* to \w change|strong="H8133"\w* \w times|strong="H2166"\w* and \w laws|strong="H1882"\w*: and they shall be \w given|strong="H3052"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w until|strong="H5705"\w* a \w time|strong="H5732"\w* and \w times|strong="H5732"\w* and the \w dividing|strong="H6387"\w* of \w time|strong="H5732"\w*.

But the \w judgment|strong="H1780"\w* shall \w sit|strong="H3488"\w*, and they shall take \w away|strong="H5709"\w* his \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w*, to \w consume|strong="H8046"\w* and to \w destroy|strong="H0007"\w* \add it\add* \w unto|strong="H5705"\w* the \w end|strong="H5491"\w*.

And the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* and \w dominion|strong="H7985"\w*, and the \w greatness|strong="H7238"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w under|strong="H8460"\w* the \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, shall be \w given|strong="H3052"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5972"\w* of the \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5946"\w*, whose \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \add is\add* an \w everlasting|strong="H5957"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, and \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w dominions|strong="H7985"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* and \w obey|strong="H8086"\w* him.\f + \fr 7.27 \ft dominions: or, rulers\f*

\w Hitherto|strong="H5705"\w* \add is\add* the \w end|strong="H5491"\w* of the \w matter|strong="H4406"\w*. As for \w me|strong="H0576"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, my \w cogitations|strong="H7476"\w* \w much|strong="H7690"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* me, and my \w countenance|strong="H2122"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* in \w me|strong="H5922"\w*: but I \w kept|strong="H5202"\w* the \w matter|strong="H4406"\w* in my \w heart|strong="H3821"\w*.
